msbt.message: Way to help a gal get her tent set up! That was seriously a rock-star move. I got you a sweet DIY recipe as a sort of thank-you gift. Oh! And if you don't know about DIY stuff yet, go bug Tom Nook ASAP.
Remember when I said I was gonna mail you something? Well, here's that something! I can't wait to see what you're gonna do with it. 's gonna look so, so awesome!
